# Vancouver Island & Mainland Inlets {#vimi}

Here is the information available for steelhead CUs in the Vancouver Island & Mainland Inlets (VIMI) region. Steelhead CUs in this region were defined in [Parkinson et al. 2005](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/library/lib_521/).

![Map of the Vancouver Island and Mainland Inlets region of the Pacific Salmon Explorer and steelhead monitoring sites](_bookdown_files/map_vimi_monitoring.png)

## *South Coast Summer* 

CU id 983


### Populations

```{r echo=FALSE}
cu_list <- read.csv("_bookdown_files/steelhead_cu_population_lookup_2022.csv")


cu_list[ (cu_list$cu_id %in% c("983")), c(3,4,11)]

```

### Spawner Surveys

![The figures display the number of spawning steelhead observed in each stream each year. Data Source: [Korman & Schick 2021](https://www.bchydro.com/content/dam/BCHydro/customer-portal/documents/corporate/environment-sustainability/water-use-planning/lower-mainland/cmsmon-03-yr12-2021-07-27.pdf).](_bookdown_files/Steelhead9919.ind.stream.jpg)

_Spawner survey data (periodic snorkel counts) are available for the Glendale Creek and the Kakweiken and Ahnuhati Rivers' winter runs. Collected by BCCF and the Province of BC. Data for 2002-2015 available online through [Marine Data BC database](https://soggy2.zoology.ubc.ca:8443/geonetwork/srv/api/records/d3832567-c07f-48dc-9a5b-74b67e707614?language=eng). Pending update datasets from the Province of BC._
